sentences.text: NOTICE OF 2017 ANNUAL MEETING AND PROXY STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 30, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors and management of Intercontinental Exchange, Inc., I am pleased to invite you to the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held at the St. Regis Atlanta, Eighty-Eight West Paces Ferry Road, Atlanta, Georgia 30305 on Friday, May 19, 2017 at 8:30 a.m., local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The attached Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement describe the formal business to be conducted at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors and senior officers, as well as representatives from our independent registered public accounting firm, will be present to respond to appropriate questions from stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Again this year, we are delivering proxy materials for the Annual Meeting under the Securities and Exchange Commissions Notice and Access rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These rules permit us to furnish proxy materials, including the attached Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report, to our stockholders by providing access to such documents on the Internet instead of mailing printed copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The rules also allow us to help the environment by reducing the consumption of paper, energy, and other natural resources and to lower printing and distribution expenses paid by Intercontinental Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders will receive a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice), which provides instructions on how to access and review all of our proxy materials on the Internet, and will not receive printed copies unless they request them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice also explains how you may submit your proxy on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether or not you plan to attend the meeting, please complete, sign, date and return the enclosed proxy card in the envelope provided or vote telephonically or electronically using the telephone and Internet voting procedures described on the proxy card at your earliest convenience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Jeffrey C. Sprecher Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Intercontinental Exchange, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO BE HELD MAY 19, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE HEREBY IS GIVEN that the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. will be held at the St. Regis Atlanta, Eighty-Eight West Paces Ferry Road, Atlanta, Georgia 30305 on Friday, May 19, 2017 at 8:30 a.m., local time, for the purposes of considering and voting upon:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. The election of eleven directors to serve until the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. An advisory resolution to approve our executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. An advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. The approval of the Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. 2017 Omnibus Employee Incentive Plan;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. The approval of an amendment to the Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. 2013 Omnibus Non-Employee Director Incentive Plan to add an aggregate annual compensation limit;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. The approval of the adoption of our Fourth Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation to update and streamline references to our national securities exchange subsidiaries, their members, and the holding companies that control such exchanges, and delete references to certain other subsidiaries;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. The approval of the adoption of our Fourth Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation to remove an obsolete proviso cross-referencing a section of our Bylaws that was deleted after the sale of the Euronext business in 2014;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8. The ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 9. A stockholder proposal regarding the preparation of a report assessing ESG market disclosure expectations, if properly presented at the Annual Meeting; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 0. Such other business as properly may come before the Annual Meeting or any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors is not aware of any other business to be presented to a vote of the stockholders at th Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has fixed the close of business on March 21, 2017 as the record date for determining the stockholders entitled to notice of and to vote at the meeting and any adjournments or postponements thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares of common stock through a broker or nominee, you will need to bring either a copy of the voting instruction card provided by your broker or nominee or a copy of a brokerage statement showing your ownership as of March 21, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A list of stockholders entitled to vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders will be available for inspection upon request of any stockholder for any purpose germane to the meeting at our principal executive offices, 5660 New Northside Drive, Third Floor, Atlanta, Georgia 30328, during the ten days prior to the meeting, during ordinary business hours, and at the St. Regis Atlanta, Eighty- Eight West Paces Ferry Road, Atlanta, Georgia 30305, during the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Important Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Stockholder Meeting to be Held on May 19, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are sending a Notice of Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (the Notice) to our stockholders rather than mailing a full paper set of the materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice contains instructions on how to access our proxy materials on the Internet and how to vote, as well as instructions on obtaining a paper copy of the proxy materials.

sentences.text: For additional information, see Additional Information  Voting Instructions and Frequently Asked Questions below.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Choose to receive an e-mail notice when proxy statements and annual reports are available for viewing over the Internet.

sentences.text: INTRODUCTION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement is furnished to the stockholders of Intercontinental Exchange, Inc. in connection with the solicitation of proxies by our Board of Directors to be voted at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders and at any adjournments or postponements thereof (the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held at the St. Regis Atlanta, Eighty-Eight West Paces Ferry Road, Atlanta, Georgia 30305 on Friday, May 19, 2017 at 8:30 a.m., local time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approximate date on which this Proxy Statement and form of proxy card are first being sent or given to stockholders is March 30, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When used in this Proxy Statement, the terms we, us, our, Intercontinental Exchange, ICE and the Company refer to Intercontinental Exchange, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary highlights certain information contained elsewhere in our Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should read our entire Proxy Statement carefully before casting your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approval of each of Proposal 6 and Proposal 7 is required to approve the adoption of our Fourth Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, each of Proposal 6 and Proposal 7 is dependent on, and cross-conditioned upon, the approval of each such proposal, and none of such proposals will be implemented unless they are all approved at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approval of Proposal 6 and Proposal 7 collectively shall constitute the requisite approval of the adoption of our Fourth Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation, attached to this Proxy Statement as Exhibit A, as required under Delaware law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date for Voting and Shares Outstanding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We had 593,453,729 shares of our common stock, $0.01 par value per share (the Common Stock), outstanding as of March 21, 2017, the record date for determining holders of our Common Stock entitled to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Developments and Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current directors that are nominated for re-election will serve a one-year term expiring at the next annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors, upon the recommendation of our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, has determined that ten of our eleven director nominees are independent under the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange LLC (NYSE) and the governance guidelines and independence policy adopted by our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors continues to be led by Mr. Jeffrey C. Sprecher, who serves as Chairman of our Board of Directors, and Mr. Frederic V. Salerno, who has been elected as lead independent director for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Salerno has served as the lead independent director of our Board of Directors since 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As lead independent director, Mr. Salerno presides at all executive sessions of the non-management directors and helps set the agenda for our Board of Director meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There have been several important developments regarding the composition of our Board of Directors and governance matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has nominated eleven director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors believes that the eleven director nominees collectively have the expertise and diversity of experience to effectively oversee and guide our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the Board of Directors focus on board refreshment, including a focus on diversity as well as a focus on succession for Board leadership positions, three of our long standing directors did not stand for re-election in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We added three new directors to our Board of Directors in the last seven months to fill specific needs deemed important by our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have added additional skill sets and diversity to our Board of Directors, which include
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thomas Noonan joined our Board of Directors in September 2016 and brings deep cyber security expertise to our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ann Cairns joined our Board of Directors in March 2017 and brings additional risk expertise to our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Cairns also chairs the board of our subsidiary, ICE Clear Europe.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Duriya Farooqui joined our Board of Directors in March 2017 and brings experience in public service, international policy and economic development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As detailed above, we have recently added two female directors to the Board bringing additional gender diversity to our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They each bring fresh ideas and unique skills to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among the current independent director nominees, four of the nominees have fewer than five years of service on our Board of Directors and one nominee has between five and ten years of experience on our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee engaged a third-party recruiting firm to help us in our search for diverse board candidates with particular skill sets that we deem important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In January 2016, our Board of Directors approved an amendment and restatement of our bylaws to implement proxy access.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The bylaws became effective upon the approval of the Securities and Exchange Commission (the SEC) on May 6, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws now provide that a stockholder, or group of up to 20 stockholders, who has held 3% of our outstanding Common Stock for at least three years may nominate and include in our annual meeting proxy materials up to the greater of two director nominees or 20% of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On August 1, 2016, our Board of Directors approved pursuing an effective forward stock split by way of a stock dividend contingent upon both the approval of the adoption of the Third Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation by the stockholders and by the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On November 3, 2016, the 5-for-1 split of our Common Stock was effected in the form of a four share stock dividend per share of Common Stock to stockholders of record as of the close of market on October 27, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The new shares began trading on a split-adjusted basis on November 4, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All share numbers and option price values in this Proxy Statement have been adjusted to reflect the stock split.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 3, 2017, our Board of Directors approved and declared advisable
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a further amendment and restatement to our Seventh Amended and Restated Bylaws (Bylaws) to replace references to the Vice Chairman with references to the Lead Independent Director and to update and streamline references to our subsidiaries and processes for our meetings of stockholders and stockholder proposals, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) our Fourth Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation to update and streamline references to our national securities exchange subsidiaries, their members, and the holding companies that control such exchanges, delete references to certain other subsidiaries and remove an obsolete proviso cross-referencing a section of our Bylaws that was deleted after the sale of the Euronext business in 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the owner of national securities exchanges (including the New York Stock Exchange), we are required to obtain approval from the SEC for any amendments to our governing documents, and such governing documents were submitted to the SEC on March 15, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Fourth Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation will, if approved by the SEC and adopted by our Stockholders at this Annual Meeting, become effective at the time stated in such filing with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At such time, the Bylaws, assuming approval by the SEC, will also become effective.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Highlights of Our 2016 Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ICE continued to deliver strong annual operating results as evidenced by the following 2016 performance highlights:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eleventh consecutive year of record revenue and adjusted earnings, including record financial results each year as a public company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record 2016 consolidated revenues less transaction-based expenses of $4.5 billion and 2016 adjusted diluted earnings per share of $2.78, up 14% year-over-year ; 1
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Returned over $450 million to stockholders through dividends and share repurchases, increased 2017 quarterly dividend by 18% relative to 2016;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Three-year total shareholder return in excess of 30% (based on stock price increase from $224.92 ($44.98 adjusted for 5-for-1 stock split) on December 31, 2013 to $56.42 on December 31, 2016, plus quarterly dividend payments); and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expanded and strengthened markets served and our range of data and risk management services through organic growth and strategic acquisitions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Developments and Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to maintain a well-balanced and performance-based executive compensation program, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More than 85% of named executive officer (NEO) targeted compensation delivered through variable, performance-based compensation programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2017, we introduced a performance-based restricted stock unit that is tied to our three-year TSR performance against the S&P 500 to introduce a longer-term measure in our performance based share awards;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More than 60% of NEO targeted compensation delivered through equity compensation programs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual cash bonus opportunity and performance-based restricted stock units capped at 200% of the established target opportunity;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mandatory and competitive stock ownership requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A compensation clawback policy;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-hedging and anti-pledging policy requirements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in control protection that requires a double-trigger (i.e., there must be a change in control and the executives employment is terminated) for payment (including equity awards) to be provided; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Internal Revenue Code Section 280G golden parachute excise tax gross-up provisions in employment agreements with our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In February 2017, annual bonuses for 2016 performance were paid at 100% of target for our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, in February 2017, performance achievement for the performance-based restricted stock units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted EPS is a non-GAAP metric.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please refer to the section titled Non-GAAP Financial Measures in ICEs Annual Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC on February 7, 2017 for the equivalent GAAP term and reconciliation to the GAAP term.

sentences.text: granted in January 2016 was calculated at above target levels due to our 2016 EBITDA  growth outperforming our pre-established goals; payouts were adjusted to 111.5% of target as a result for our executives, including our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ICE had historically used a one-year EBITDA performance measure for the performance-based restricted stock unit plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning in 2017, we are introducing a performance-based restricted stock unit that is tied to our three-year TSR performance against the S&P 500 to introduce a longer-term measure in our performance based share awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will still issue some portion of long-term incentive awards through the traditional one-year EBITDA share awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of these items is discussed in more detail below in Compensation Matters  Compensation Discussion & Analysis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that our mix of cash/non-cash and short-term/long-term incentives provides an appropriate balance between our longer-term business objectives and shorter-term retention and competitive needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe that providing the majority of our NEOs compensation in the form of long-term equity awards, when combined with our clawback policy and stock ownership requirements, both of which are described below, has the additional benefit of discouraging employees from taking inappropriate risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should review Compensation Matters  Compensation Discussion & Analysis and Compensation Matters  Executive Compensation below and the compensation-related tables for a complete understanding of our compensation program, including a detailed review of the philosophy, process, considerations, and analysis involved in the determination of compensation granted or paid to our NEOs in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EBITDA is earnings before interest and other non-operating income and expense, taxes, depreciation and amortization, which is a non-GAAP financial measure, and serves as a performance target for ICE.

sentences.text: CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL 1  ELECTION OF DIRECTORS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our current Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation and Bylaws, our Board of Directors sets the number of directors who may serve on the Board of Directors through resolutions adopted by a majority of the directors then in office.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The size of our Board of Directors is currently set at 11 directors and presently consists of 11 directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have nominated all of our current directors for re-election at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our nominees, if elected, will serve for a one-year term expiring at the next annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director will hold office until his or her successor is duly elected and qualified or until the directors earlier resignation or removal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of our directors is elected by majority vote in an uncontested election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who fails to receive a majority of for votes cast by stockholders entitled to vote will be required to tender his or her resignation to our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee will then act on an expedited basis to determine whether to accept the directors resignation and will submit such recommendation for prompt consideration by our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors expects the director whose resignation is under consideration to abstain from participating in any decision regarding that resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors and our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee may consider any factors they deem relevant in deciding whether to accept a directors resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees for Election as Directors at the 2017 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the recommendation of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, our Board of Directors has nominated the persons named below for election as directors at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders, each to serve for a one-year term expiring at the next annual meeting of stockholders in 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the nominees currently are members of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors, upon the recommendation of our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, has determined that each of our non-employee directors is independent in accordance with NYSE listing standards and our Board of Directors Governance Guidelines as described below under Corporate Governance  Structure and Role of Our Board  Independent Non-Employee Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the nominees has confirmed that he or she expects to be able to continue to serve as a director until the end of his or her term.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If, however, at the time of the Annual Meeting, any of the nominees named below is not available to serve as a director (an event which the Board of Directors does not anticipate), all the proxies granted to vote in favor of such directors election will be voted for the election of such other person or persons, if any, recommended by the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee and approved by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxies cannot be voted for a greater number of directors than the eleven nominees named in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a discussion of our policy regarding qualification and nomination of director candidates, see Corporate Governance  Structure and Role of Our Board  Nomination of Directors below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Set forth below are the nominees names, biographical information, age, summary of qualifications and the year in which each director joined our Board of Directors:

sentences.text: Ann M. Cairns
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Ann Cairns is President, International Markets for Mastercard, where she is responsible for the management of all markets and customer-related activities outside North America; a role she has held since August 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She currently serves as Chair of ICE Clear Europe, our subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From 2008 to 2011, she was Managing Director and Head of the Financial Industry Services group for Europe with Alvarez & Marsal in London where she oversaw the European liquidation of Lehman Brothers Holdings International.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, Ms. Cairns was Chief Executive Officer, Transaction Banking at ABN-AMRO in London, from 2002 to 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the start of her career, she spent time as an award-winning research engineer, culminating as the Head of Offshore Engineer-Planning for British Gas and was the first woman qualified to go offshore in Britain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Cairns joined the AstraZeneca Board of Directors in 2014 and will end her term as a director of AstraZeneca in April 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: She received a Bachelor of Science in Pure Mathematics at Sheffield University and a Master of Science in Statistics from Newcastle University, UK.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In light of Ms. Cairns expansive experience across international business, risk management and financial sectors, as well as business acumen as a global executive that has led operations in Europe, U.S. and Japan, our Board, based upon the recommendation of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, has determined that Ms. Cairns should be re-elected to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Inc. from 1982 to 1985 and he was with Conoco, Inc., where he held various positions in engineering, operations and management from 1969 to 1982.

sentences.text: Name The Right Hon. the Lord Hague of Richmond
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lord Hague is the Chairman of the United for Wildlife Taskforce, Chairman for the International Advisory Board at the law firm Linklaters and Chairman of the security and defense think-tank, the Royal United Services Institute.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also serves as Senior Adviser to global advisory firm Teneo.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lord Hague currently serves as Chairman of the Board of Directors of ICE Futures Europe, our subsidiary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has previously served as an advisor to the JCB Group and Terra Firma Capital Partners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hague was a member of the House of Parliament from 1989 to 2015, serving in various capacities, including Parliamentary Private Secretary to the Chancellor of the Exchequer, Parliamentary Under-Secretary of State at the Department of Social Security, Minister of State, Secretary of State for Wales, Foreign Secretary, First Secretary of State and most recently, Leader of the House of Commons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a member of the House of Lords.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Parliament, Mr. Hague was a management consultant at McKinsey & Co Inc. and worked for Shell (UK) Limited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lord Hague frequently carries out speaking engagements on regulatory and political matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Hague holds a First-Class Honours degree in Philosophy, Politics, and Economics from Oxford University and an MBA with distinction from the Institut dAdministration des Affaires (INSEAD).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In light of Lord Hagues extensive governmental and political experience in the United Kingdom, his service on the ICE Futures Europe board and the knowledge and experience he provides, our Board, based upon the recommendation of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, has determined that Lord Hague should be re-elected to our Board.
